content.question: The study of economics is based on the premise that

choices.label: goods and services are scarce but capital is unlimited
the growth of government is limited but resources are unlimited
natural resources are scarce but labor is unlimited
factors of production are scarce but goods and services people desire are unlimited
consumer products are scarce but resources are unlimited

content.answer: factors of production are scarce but goods and services people desire are unlimited

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe economic concepts, principles, or models.
